page.title: 05FARMING SCAR SYKES & DUBBS
page.content: ACRES 1,066 {ANIMALS} COWS AND CALVES 250,EWES AND LAMBS 3,000,BULLS 2,HENS 25,SHEEPDOGS 10 CATS LOTS! AND 21 GEESE. {BUILDINGS} COWSHEDS,HENHOUSES,PREFAB FOR LAMBING CLIPPING SHED,CALF HULLS,BYRES,SHEDS GARAGES,COAL HOUSES,4 BARNS,GOOSE HULL 2 SILAGE PITS AND A SLURRY PIT. {VEHICLES} 5 TRACTORS,1 WAGON,1 LANDROVER,2 CARS AND ONE FARM MOTOR-BIKE. {INSIDE JOBS} COOKING,CLEANING,WASHING,SHOPPING,SORT ING OUT BILLS. {OUTSIDE JOBS } FENCING,BALING,MILKING,CLIPPING,WALLIN G,SEEDING,FORAGING,SHEPARDING,PLOUGHIN G,ENGINEERING,DRAINING,POTATO CROPPING STONE-PICKING,LAMBING,GATHERING,DIPPIN G,DOSEING,TREE FELLING.
